id: Annual Subscription Tracking Management 2.0  - Notion Template
name: Annual Subscription Tracking Management 2.0  - Notion Template
description: Version：v2 Update Time：2024/7/26中文版说明见下方 ↓Template overview:The Annual Subscription List is a free Notion template that helps users track and manage various subscription services in their daily work life, such as cost recording, reminder, management, etc.In the 2.0 version, we’ve also introduced Notion’s native chart, greatly enhancing the chart experience for the template. Notice: The new chart is not available now. You will receive the new charts in the upcoming Notion version update a few day
features: For new users, keep the field definition, formula, and other Settings in the database, first simple browsing and trial, familiar with the functions of the daily record and management.; For your first use, click Duplicate above the link to copy the template into your Notion space.; To ensure that the template can be used properly, enter and modify data according to the instructions in the template.; 对于新用户，请勿修改数据库中的字段定义、公式等设定，先进行简单的浏览和试用，熟悉各项功能后在进行日常记录和管理。; 第一次使用请在链接上方点击Duplicate将模板复制到自己的 Notion 空间中，方可进行操作。; 为了确保能够正常使用该模板，请按照模板中的指引进行数据的录入和修改。
